item.title: How the low-vision community embraced AI smart glasses
item.description: It’s easy to scoff at AI and ask, “Who is actually asking for this?” You might also think that smart glasses “aren’t worth it yet.” But to the blind and low-vision community, the Ray-Ban Meta smart gl

item.title: Here's What We Know About DOGE 2.0
item.description: DOGE has continued to operate in full force in its post-Elon iteration. Today on Uncanny Valley, we tell you everything you need to know about the agency.

item.title: All eyes on Samsung’s thin new foldable
item.description: It’s always felt to me like there’s a threshold foldables need to hit before they can truly become mainstream: they need to be no bigger than a regular old phone. And now Samsung has finally gotten it

item.title: All eyes on Samsung’s thin new foldable
item.description: It’s always felt to me like there’s a threshold foldables need to hit before they can truly become mainstream: they need to be no bigger than a regular old phone. And now Samsung has finally gotten it
